description:
文字稿

No, they're not soldiers. These armed men are actually teachers.

At this school in Pakistan, teachers have been told to carry guns in order to protect children. One is even acting as a sniper on the school roof.

Many schools have taken this unusual step following a Taliban attack that killed over 130 pupils.

This teacher says he would rather be carrying a pen.

不，他们不是士兵。这些武装男子其实都是学校的老师。

在巴基斯坦的这所学校里，教师们被告知要携带枪支以便保护孩子。一名教师甚至登上了学校楼顶充当狙击手。

在130多名学生死于塔利班袭击事件之后，许多学校都采取了这一不寻常的措施。

这位老师说他宁愿携带一只笔而不是枪。

 
练习

以下练习中的语句全部选自于其他网页。请从下面的词汇表里选择答案来完成句子。注意：你可能需要改变单词的时态来完成句子。

armed / in order to /sniper / unusual step / pupil                   

1. Human rights groups say that dozens of people have been killed during the protests. The government puts the figure at 12 - a policeman shot by a __________ and 11 looters killed by security guards.

2. The people behind one of the biggest video games of the year are taking the __________ of banning some of its fans from playing the online, multi-player version.

3. A 90-year-old Kenyan woman who goes to class with six of her great-great-grandchildren is believed to be the oldest primary school __________ in the world.

4. Labour Leader Ed Miliband said he would "put working people first" __________ build a prosperous UK if his party comes to power in the general election.

5. In September a man __________ with a knife scaled the White House perimeter fence and gained access to the building.

 
词汇

armed 武装的，携带武器的

in order to 为了                    

sniper 狙击手                            

unusual step 不寻常的措施                           

pupils 学生

 
答案

1. Human rights groups say that dozens of people have been killed during the protests. The government puts the figure at 12 - a policeman shot by a sniper and 11 looters killed by security guards.

2. The people behind one of the biggest video games of the year are taking the unusual step of banning some of its fans from playing the online, multi-player version.

3. A 90-year-old Kenyan woman who goes to class with six of her great-great-grandchildren is believed to be the oldest primary school pupil in the world.

4. Labour Leader Ed Miliband said he would "put working people first" in order to build a prosperous UK if his party comes to power in the general election.

5. In September a man armed with a knife scaled the White House perimeter fence and gained access to the building.

title: 每周一报：Guns in school 教师携枪保护学生

description:
文字稿
 
Does chopping these make you cry? This farmer in the south of England thinks he has the answer.
Alastair Findlay has been developing a 'No Tears' onion for twenty years. Each season he has tasted hundreds of varieties to find the perfect flavour.
The new hybrid has a milder taste and aroma than others. That's good news for your eyes – and also your breath.
 
你切洋葱会不会流眼泪？一位英格兰南部的农民为你解决了这一困扰。
阿拉斯泰尔·芬德利花了二十年的时间种植了一种“无泪”洋葱。在每一个养殖季节里，他品尝了上百种的洋葱，从中找到了最好的味道。
这个新杂交品种比一般的洋葱味道要稍淡一些，而且有种香味。除了切洋葱时不再流泪外，吃完之后也不会有口臭。
 
练习
 
以下练习中的语句全部选自于其他网页。请从下面的词汇表里选择答案来完成句子。注意：你可能需要改变单词的时态来完成句子。
chopping / varieties / hybrid / aroma / breath
 
1. New Rice For Africa (Nerica) was developed less than 10 years ago and is a __________ combining the higher yielding Asian and the hardy African seeds.
 
2. Although garlic is good for you - containing several vitamins and minerals - once eaten, it can cause bad__________ and body odour lasting hours or even days.
 
3. For the sauce, wipe the mushrooms with a damp cloth, before finely __________ them.
 
4. An ancient __________ of pear tree that was once at risk of disappearing is being preserved and replanted by a Bedfordshire agricultural college.
 
5. "Make fruits cascade down and their sweet __________ fill the air on the sea of apple trees at the foot of Chol Pass!"
 
词汇

chopping   切
varieties     不同品种
hybrid     混合品种
aroma     香气
breath    呼吸   

答案
 
1. New Rice For Africa (Nerica) was developed less than 10 years ago and is a hybrid combining the higher yielding Asian and the hardy African seeds.
 
2. Although garlic is good for you - containing several vitamins and minerals - once eaten, it can cause bad breath and body odour lasting hours or even days.
 
3. For the sauce, wipe the mushrooms with a damp cloth, before finely chopping them.
 
4. An ancient variety of pear tree that was once at risk of disappearing is being preserved and replanted by a Bedfordshire agricultural college.
 
5. "Make fruits cascade down and their sweet aroma fill the air on the sea of apple trees at the foot of Chol Pass!"
